councilStructure: 2 wards, 2 aldermen per ward (4 total aldermen)
notes: Ward-based system required by Missouri law (RSMo 79.060) for cities over 1,000 population. Current aldermen: Ward 1 (Floyd Blackwell, Don Johnson), Ward 2 (Earline Jones Collins, Alvin Robinson). No public GIS data found; may need to contact city or St. Louis County GIS.

councilStructure: 3 wards, 2 alderpersons per ward (6 total alderpersons), mayor elected at-large
notes: Ward system per Missouri law for cities over 1,000 population. Underwent redistricting in 2023 (Bill 2023-969) based on 2020 Census. Population: 3,173 (2020). City map available but no downloadable shapefiles found.

councilStructure: 4 wards, 2 council members per ward (8 total), staggered 2-year terms
notes: Third Class Mayor-Council-Administrator form of government per Missouri statutes. Redistricted November 2021 based on 2020 Census (ideal district population: 1,117). Ward and zoning maps available on city website but downloadable GIS data not confirmed.

councilStructure: 4 wards, 2 aldermen per ward (8 total), mayor elected at-large
notes: Charter city with 4 wards. Population ~11,000. Mayor and aldermen serve up to three 3-year terms. Ward map available as PDF on city website (2020 Wards map) but no downloadable shapefile data found. St. Louis County GIS portal (data-stlcogis.opendata.arcgis.com) has municipal boundaries but not ward-level data.
